* Team SIP/VoIP network
  Team SIP/VoIP conferences can be accessed using a softphone or a regular phone.To access via gizmo use 5000@sip.nerdsonlinux.net or by dialing *8771-5000 using a regular phone or a sip account that is supported by sipbroker.net info can be found at http://www.sipbroker.com/sipbroker/action/pstnNumbers for regular phones. We also have an 800 number that is available upon request as well as local sip accounts provided by us just contact brian@ubuntu-newyork.com for details.
